title: Vertical line
text: When the equation of a line is given as $$x=c$$, it is a vertical line. So the graph of $$x=4$$ is a vertical line.

title: Horizontal line
text: When the equation of a line is given as $$y=c$$, it is a horizontal line. So the graph of $$y=-3$$ is a horizontal line.

title: Determining Whether the Lines are Parallel, Perpendicular, or Neither
text: $$x=4$$ is a vertical line and $$y=-3$$ is a horizontal line, so they are perpendicular to each other.
